Title: Nigeria ranks 3rd in African military strength, wants Israel-Iran ceasefire
Summary: Nigeria ranks 3rd in African military strength, wants Israel-Iran ceasefire . Nigeria has emerged as the third most powerful military force in Africa, according to the latest Global Firepower Index . The country’s government calls for calm .

Title: NYCN expels Sukubo over alleged factionalisation, impersonation, perjury
Summary: National Youth Council of Nigeria expels Sukubo Saraigbe over alleged factionalisation, impersonation, perjury . The factional leader of the group has been expelled over alleged breach of laid-down rules and divisive tendencies . At a press conference held in Abuja over the expulsion, NYCN held in response to the expulsion .

Title: Full list: Top 10 Africa’s strongest country by military strength
Summary: Africa’s top military powers for 2025 have been unveiled, with Egypt maintaining its dominance . Egypt maintains its dominance, while Nigeria climbs to the third position in the latest Global Firepower Index .

Title: Most Impressive AI Tool for Creative Digital Marketers in Nigeria
Summary: Digital marketing in Nigeria has evolved significantly, with businesses increasingly seeking automated solutions to compete in crowded online spaces . Businesses are increasingly looking for automated solutions . This is the most impressive AI tool for Creative Digital Marketers in Nigeria .

Title: Tinubu celebrates Abdulsalami Abubakar at 83
Summary: Nigeria’s President Bola Ahmed Tinubu has extended birthday wishes to a former Nigerian Head of State . General Abdulsalami Abubakar (rtd) is celebrating his 83rd birthday .

Title: Bauchi approves recruitment of 2,000 forest security operatives – CG
Summary: Bauchi State approves recruitment of 2,000 forest security operatives – CG . Commander-General, General, Dr Joshua Osatimehin hails Gov. Bala Mohammed for the recruitment .

Title: Tinubu pays tribute to Abdulsalami Abubakar on 83rd birthday
Summary: President Bola Tinubu on Sunday paid tribute to Gen. Abdulsalami Abubakar (Rtd.) on his 83rd birthday .

Title: Ebonyi police arrest armed robber, recover pistol, live cartridge
Summary: Police in Ebonyi State have arrested one Chibuzor Nworie for armed robbery . They recovered a locally-made single-barrel pistol with a live cartridge in his possession .

Title: Full List: Nigeria, other 24 African countries Trump considering for new travel ban
Summary: President Donald Trump is reportedly weighing the possibility of imposing a new travel ban that could affect Nigeria and 25 other African countries, according to a report by The Washington Post .

Title: SERAP to Tinubu: Prosecute those responsible for June 12 annulment
Summary: SERAP has urged President Bola Tinubu to promptly set up a presidential panel of enquiry to investigate the unlawful annulment of the elections of June 12 1993 .

Title: Bauchi approves recruitment of 2,000 forest security guards
Summary: The Commander-General of the Nigeria Forest Security Service, Joshua Osatimehin, praised Bauchi Governor Bala Mohammed for approving the recruitment of 2,000 operatives for the service . Title: Police arrest robbery suspect, recover pistol in Ebonyi
Summary: The Ebonyi Police Command has arrested a suspect identified as Chibuzor Nworie over an alleged robbery at Onuebonyi Junction in Abakaliki Local Government Area of the state . The suspect was apprehended after the command received a distress call about a gang of thieves operating in the area .

Title: Bauchi begins June immunisation campaign, targets 2.2 million children
Summary: The Bauchi State Government has flagged off the June 2025 National Immunisation Plus Days with the aim of vaccinating over 2.2 million eligible children under the age of five across the state . The exercise is expected to run for four days, with immunisation teams visiting communities, schools, and health facilities to administer vaccines .

Title: Davido cancels London stadium show over organisational problems
Summary: Afrobeats star David Adeleke, known as Davido, has pulled out of his highly anticipated concert at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium, originally scheduled for July 3, citing unresolved issues with the event’s planning and execution .
